mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Chafin, Charles A.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This document was issued and signed by Charles A. Chafin, the Clerk of the County Court of Rockbridge. The document asserts that Joshua Johnson is a free man of colour, aged twenty one years. He was emancipated by Robert Hutcheson, Executor of the last will and testament of Hugh Adams, deceased.
The available file is a PDF made from scans of the original document.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Emancipation Certificate for Joshua Johnson, April 2, 1860
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Legacies
Slavery
Slaves -- Emancipation
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
